Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game.Board
public class Board extends Object
The board game, shared among all players. It contains Deck and FaceUpCard.
